entropy.core.packers

Class SimpleBinPacking

  • java.lang.Object
    • choco.kernel.solver.propagation.Propagator
      • choco.kernel.solver.constraints.AbstractSConstraint<choco.kernel.solver.variables.Var>
        • choco.kernel.solver.constraints.set.AbstractMixedSetIntSConstraint
          • choco.kernel.solver.constraints.set.AbstractLargeSetIntSConstraint
            • entropy.core.packers.SimpleBinPacking
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    choco.cp.solver.constraints.global.pack.IPackSConstraint, choco.IExtensionnable, choco.IPretty, choco.kernel.solver.constraints.SConstraint<choco.kernel.solver.variables.Var>, choco.kernel.solver.propagation.listener.IntPropagator, choco.kernel.solver.propagation.listener.SetPropagator, CustomPack, Cloneable, EventListener

    public class SimpleBinPacking
extends choco.kernel.solver.constraints.set.AbstractLargeSetIntSConstraint
implements choco.cp.solver.constraints.global.pack.IPackSConstraint, CustomPack
    A simplified version of PackSConstraint. Required and candidate loads are computed incrementally while some coding tips speeds up computation. The constraint does not however support all the options in PackSConstraint
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier
    See Also:
    PackSConstraint
